name: Passing Time By A River
description:
Watch the days and seasons pass by in this relaxing game. You can even fish by clicking on the fish that swim by :)

Full Explanation txt file included with the game files

Features

  • low poly landscape
  • day/night cycles, including sun/moon
  • seasonal cycles (river freezes, flowers grow...
  • cheat codes for interesting changes (you can even have multiple ones at the same time!)
  • some easter eggs
